<b>Analysis</b> is meant to be repeated: Analysis is meant to be repeated over time alongside the early stages of city planning or projects’ preparation\n process and can also serve as a stand-alone capacity building resource enabling a concise overview of new and innovative\n financing instruments and an interpretation of their mechanisms and areas of application.
<b>This application requires cookies to:
This application requires cookies to function properly. As such, the application will store cookies on your device, while using it.
You can configure your browser to block the use of cookies, but that might render this application unusable for you.
Some of these cookies might be retained for a few days, but if you wish, you can manually delete them from your browser earlier, once you're done using the application.
Please note that deleting your cookies will also instantly log you out.
<div class=\"flex flex-col gap-2 my-1\">: Need help using the app? Check out the :GuidelinesLink! Need further support or to contact us? Email us: rdmtool.teeslab [at] unipi.gr Want to look at the app's code? Check out our :RepoLink!
<i>Please note that this process is not:
Please note that this process is not automated and might take a few days.
\n If you are looking to delete specific information, please refer to the "Data retention" section,\n as you might be able to take advantage of the application's functions to delete what you need in an automated way.
Additionally, during your analyses, we c: Additionally, during your analyses, we collect the following:
Are Budgetary Rules for public and regio: Are Budgetary Rules for public and regional authorities revised to exclude financing schemes (e.g. EPC) from debt quota obligations?
Are city's own capital requirements (e.g: Are city's own capital requirements (e.g. available city budget) sufficient to implement the financing scheme?
Are subsidies, tax benefits, or other in: Are subsidies, tax benefits, or other incentives and obligations(e.g energy savings, EEOs, etc) available for private project investors and lenders?
Are your city's SECAP related projects a: Are your city's SECAP related projects and initiatives adequately disseminated to prospect investors and actors?
Are you sure you want to delete this ana: Are you sure you want to delete this analysis?
auth.failed: These credentials do not match our records.
auth.throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in :seconds seconds.
Can your municipality capitalize from le: Can your municipality capitalize from lending institutions to support your city's project implementation?
Continue to the Quick Finance Readiness: Continue to the Quick Finance Readiness Check
Cookies are small text files that a webs: Cookies are small text files that a website may store on your device when you visit.
detect, prevent and address potential se: detect, prevent and address potential security issues concerning our services
Does the city have a history on default: Does the city have a history on default on debt?
Does the municipality plan to sub-contra: Does the municipality plan to sub-contract its roles and responsibilities with respect to project implementation, and/or transfer all or part of the necessary proceeds,  to a third implementing entity either internal or external?
Does the public stance support your city: Does the public stance support your city's project related investments within the planned timeframe?
Does your city's financing strategy anal: Does your city's financing strategy analyze both public and private, domestic and international, potential funding sources for supporting the priorities identified?
Does your city's project demonstrate a c: Does your city's project demonstrate a clear national ownership and national direction on its strategic priorities, with a long-term finance orientation, considering potential options for refinancing or repaying investment (e.g. through energy bills or taxation etc)?
Does your city's project demonstrate a n: Does your city's project demonstrate a national investment prioritization process directly supported by existing municipal budgets and/or dedicated national or international funding sources?
Does your city's project describe how pr: Does your city's project describe how priority objectives will be translated into specific concept notes, utilizing new financial instruments or mobilizing large scale finance from third development partners in the future?
Does your city have a SECAP or other sim: Does your city have a SECAP or other similar sustainable plan or strategy?
Does your municipality have the appropri: Does your municipality have the appropriate (multi-departmental) structure responsible for the ultimate oversight, including co-ordination, monitoring, performance risks management etc, over your city's project efficient implementation?
Does your municipality have the necessar: Does your municipality have the necessary capacity to conduct business development activities among which investigating alternative funding sources?
Does your municipality have the necessary know-how and/or technical expertise to support the implementation of the respective financing scheme?
Does your municipality have the necessary resources to support your city's project development and implementation within the planned timeframe?
Do ownership issues with regard to city': Do ownership issues with regard to city's assets (e.g. buildings) facilitate the implementation of your city's project related investments in these assets?
Do public procurement procedures facilit: Do public procurement procedures facilitate sustainable energy investments adequately?
For each <b>sector of recommendation</b>: For each sector of recommendation, there are specific innovative financing schemes that could be best employed.
For each <b>specific scheme</b> an easy-: For each specific scheme an easy-to-grasp checklist of selected decision criteria identifies an ease of implementation\n rate (%), based on the project-specific characteristics and the general framework conditions.
Forgot your password? No problem. Just l: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password\n reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
For this please also see our template on: For this please also see our template on calculating financial indicators that you can find on our website.
Guest mode: log in if you want your anal: Guest mode: log in if you want your analyses to be saved!
Has a baseline <strong>energy consumptio: Has a baseline energy consumption been determined?
Has your city's project been formally va: Has your city's project been formally validated by your City's Council at a high political level?
Have you assessed any <strong>challengin: Have you assessed any challenging regulations or policies that could pose a risk or barrier for your project?
Have you assessed any existing <strong>h: Have you assessed any existing helpful regulations or policies that can support the development of your project?
Have you assessed the <strong>market con: Have you assessed the market conditions for your project including incentives and potential barriers?
Have you calculated the <strong>expected: Have you calculated the expected revenues from energy savings and/or the expected revenues from the selling of renewable energy generated by your project over its lifetime?
Have you calculated your <strong>total i: Have you calculated your total investment costs for the project?
Have you defined the <strong>measures</s: Have you defined the measures that you intend to implement in your project?
Have you determined the <strong>payback: Have you determined the payback period for your project?
Have you determined the energy savings a: Have you determined the energy savings and/or renewable energy production resulting from your planned measures?
Have you developed a <strong>budget</str: Have you developed a budget with all the costs for your project including operating costs?
Have you developed a <strong>risk analys: Have you developed a risk analysis of potential risks or negative impacts your project might have?
Have you developed a <strong>working pla: Have you developed a working plan or roadmap for the implementation of the project outlining the different steps and responsibilities?
Have you developed an overview of the <s: Have you developed an overview of the governance structure of the project, including roles and responsibilities and decision-making processes?
if you're in editing mode (where it appl: if you're in editing mode (where it applies)
In addition, Google Analytics uses cooki: In addition, Google Analytics uses cookies to function. For more information, please refer to the section "What data we collect".
In addition, we gather <b>analytics</b>: In addition, we gather analytics data (using Google Analytics 4) in order to prepare aggregated, anonymized statistics on visitor’s activity.\n This data includes basic information about your device/browser (e.g. language), your region/country (not granular location or IP address),\n and information as you browse the website and perform certain actions (e.g. view results, edit stored information); specifically:
In case the municipality plans to sub-co: In case the municipality plans to sub-contract and/or transfer all or part of the necessary proceeds, to a private third implementing entity is a clear explanation of the contractual arrangements, including transactional flow and/or flow of information, in place?
Innovative financing is an option for ur: Innovative financing is an option for urban climate and sustainable development projects,\n but cities, municipalities and regions need to know how to activate and use it.\n The Recommendation-Decision Matrix tool is working to that effect!
In order to calculate the impacts of you: In order to calculate the impacts of your project, you need to know your baseline energy consumption before the implementation of any measures.
In order to calculate the revenues of yo: In order to calculate the revenues of your project you need to have a clear understanding of your impacts in terms of energy savings and/or renewable energy produced.
Is a Steering Committee or similar inter: Is a Steering Committee or similar internal mechanism in place or planned as a governing body to fully oversee and guide your city's project implementation?
Is co-financing available and complete d: Is co-financing available and complete detail provided in your city's project proposal budget?
Is the city's cooperation and communicat: Is the city's cooperation and communication with non-traditional investment actors (e.g. ESCOs) sufficient to implement the respective scheme?
Is the city's cooperation and communication with public actors for SECAP or other investment projects adequate so as to implement the financing scheme?

Is the city's cooperation and communication with traditional private actors for SECAP or other investment projects (e.g. banks, utilities, energy providers, etc) sufficient in order to implement the scheme?
Is the city's personnel for project unde: Is the city's personnel for project underwriting & evaluation sufficient to support the implementation of the respective financing scheme?
Is the process to gain a construction/re: Is the process to gain a construction/renovation permit fast and efficient?
Is the typical nominal bank lending rate: Is the typical nominal bank lending rate relatively low?
Is your city's project anticipated durat: Is your city's project anticipated duration and implementation schedule reasonable and fully coordinated with all relevant investment actors and stakeholders involved?
It is important to understand which poli: It is important to understand which political factors or regulations can positively influence your project, including e.g. financial and regulatory incentives for energy efficiency measures, one-stop-shops, equal opportunities for public procurement, facilitated licensing for renewable energy projects, etc.

It is important to understand which political factors or regulations negatively influence your project, such as e.g. long and bureaucratic licensing processes, requirements for impact assessments, land-use and ownership barriers etc.

The <b>Recommendation-Decision Matrix to: The Recommendation-Decision Matrix tool has been developed in :PROSPECTplusLink, a capacity-building HORIZON 2020 project aiming at bringing\n together EU municipalities and empowering them to make more informed decisions on implementing their local energy and climate plans\n (e.g. SEAPs, SECAPs, etc.) by using the appropriate :PPLearningProgrammeLink.

The Recommendation-Decision Matrix tool is designed to support local governments on their first decision-making steps against a wide array of innovative schemes for financing their climate and sustainability actions. A practical and easy-to-use tool, free and accessible to all local and regional authorities and their implementing agencies, who are looking at ways to increase or diversify their funding base in order to bridge their municipal infrastructure needs across 5 different sectors:
The reasons we process your information: The reasons we process your information depend on how you interact with this service and include:
These include all measures that result i: These include all measures that result in energy savings or the production of renewable energies. You need to have a clear understanding of which measures you plan to implement in your project in order to understand the project costs and revenues.
This web application was created and is: This web application was created and is hosted by TEESlab.
To facilitate account creation, recovery: To facilitate account creation, recovery and user authentication

validation.accepted_if: The :attribute field must be accepted when :other is :value.
validation.active_url: The :attribute field must be a valid URL.
validation.after: The :attribute field must be a date after :date.
validation.after_or_equal: The :attribute field must be a date after or equal to :date.
validation.alpha: The :attribute field must only contain letters.
validation.alpha_dash: The :attribute field must only contain letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.
validation.alpha_num: The :attribute field must only contain letters and numbers.
validation.array: The :attribute field must be an array.
validation.ascii: The :attribute field must only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols.
validation.before: The :attribute field must be a date before :date.
validation.before_or_equal: The :attribute field must be a date before or equal to :date.
validation.between.array: The :attribute field must have between :min and :max items.
validation.between.file: The :attribute field must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
validation.between.numeric: The :attribute field must be between :min and :max.
validation.between.string: The :attribute field must be between :min and :max characters.
validation.boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
validation.confirmed: The :attribute field confirmation does not match.
validation.date: The :attribute field must be a valid date.
validation.date_equals: The :attribute field must be a date equal to :date.
validation.date_format: The :attribute field must match the format :format.
validation.decimal: The :attribute field must have :decimal decimal places.
validation.declined_if: The :attribute field must be declined when :other is :value.
validation.different: The :attribute field and :other must be different.
validation.digits_between: The :attribute field must be between :min and :max digits.
validation.dimensions: The :attribute field has invalid image dimensions.
validation.distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
validation.doesnt_end_with: The :attribute field must not end with one of the following: :values.
validation.doesnt_start_with: The :attribute field must not start with one of the following: :values.
validation.email: The :attribute field must be a valid email address.
validation.ends_with: The :attribute field must end with one of the following: :values.
validation.file: The :attribute field must be a file.
validation.filled: The :attribute field must have a value.
validation.gt.array: The :attribute field must have more than :value items.
validation.gt.file: The :attribute field must be greater than :value kilobytes.
validation.gt.numeric: The :attribute field must be greater than :value.
validation.gt.string: The :attribute field must be greater than :value characters.

validation.gte.file: The :attribute field must be greater than or equal to :value kilobytes.

validation.gte.string: The :attribute field must be greater than or equal to :value characters.
validation.image: The :attribute field must be an image.
validation.integer: The :attribute field must be an integer.

validation.lt.file: The :attribute field must be less than :value kilobytes.
validation.lt.numeric: The :attribute field must be less than :value.

validation.lte.file: The :attribute field must be less than or equal to :value kilobytes.
validation.lte.numeric: The :attribute field must be less than or equal to :value.
validation.lte.string: The :attribute field must be less than or equal to :value characters.
validation.mac_address: The :attribute field must be a valid MAC address.
validation.max.array: The :attribute field must not have more than :max items.
validation.max.file: The :attribute field must not be greater than :max kilobytes.
validation.max.numeric: The :attribute field must not be greater than :max.

We collect the data <b>registered and lo:
We collect the data registered and logged in users directly provide to us.
\n More specifically, provided during registration or when editing your profile:
We do <b>not</b> share your personal dat:
We do not share your personal data with any third parties.
\n Your anonymized site activity will be gathered by Google Analytics, as described above.
We have implemented appropriate and reas:
We have implemented appropriate and reasonable technical security measures to secure the date we process and retain.
\n However, the transmission of data between our services and your device is at your own risk.\n You should access our services through a secure connection and device.
We inform you that you have the right to: We inform you that you have the right to lodge a complaint to the competent data protection authority, pursuant to Article 77 of the Regulation\n (EU) 2016/679, if you believe that your personal data have been processed in violation of any applicable law concerning data protection.
We keep the data listed above for <b>as:
We keep the data listed above for as long as necessary to fulfil the purposes already described.
\n When you perform changes your account or analysis data, the previous data will not be retained.
\n When account or analysis data gets deleted by the user, we do not keep it on our infrastructure anymore.
We may revise this Privacy & Cookies pol: We may revise this Privacy & Cookies policy from time to time, for example due to changes in our practices or for other operational,\n legal or regulatory reasons. You should check this page occasionally to ensure you are up to date with the most current version of the policy.
We process your data on the legal ground: We process your data on the legal ground that such processing is necessary to:
When using this web application you cons: When using this web application you consent to the collection, storage, processing and utilization of your information as described in this Privacy Policy.
When you create or edit the info of your: When you create or edit the info of your account or analyses, we might also store creation/modification timestamps.
Where feasible, does your city's project: Where feasible, does your city's project financing strategy provide for a mix of financial instruments and/or business models to create public-private partnerships, multiple financiers and service providers (e.g. for coordinating and mobilizing resources, sharing associated investment risks etc)?
whether or not you're logged in: whether or not you're logged in
Will your city's project utilize other i: Will your city's project utilize other innovative sources, such as levies?
With who we share your data: With who we share your data
You can change your profile info from he:
You can change your profile info from here.
\n To keep the same password, just leave the "New Password" field empty.
\n If you wish to set a new password, you will also need to enter your current password.
You can request a <b>full copy</b> or th:
You can request a full copy or the full erasure of your data that we retain by contacting us.
\n In addition, the aforementioned data erasure does not include any data we are obligated to keep for legal or security purposes.
You may <b>rectify</b> your personal dat:
You may rectify your personal data directly through the application, but you can contact us if you're unable to, in order to assert your rights.
\n You may contact us in order to assert your right to find out whether your personal data is being processed or restrict/object to the processing thereof.
Your <b>IP address</b> might be stored,:
Your IP address might be stored, in order for the application to function and if required to protect our services from attacks.
\n This applies to all users, not just the registered and logged in ones.
